name: UCSF Medical Center
notes: Primary teaching hospital of UCSF School of Medicine; part of the UC Health system spanning multiple campuses (Parnassus, Mission Bay, Mount Zion)

name: UCHealth University of Colorado Hospital
notes: Principal teaching hospital of the University of Colorado School of Medicine on the Anschutz Medical Campus; part of the UCHealth nonprofit system

name: UW Medical Center
notes: Flagship academic medical center of UW Medicine and the University of Washington School of Medicine; Montlake campus bed count

name: Banner - University Medical Center Phoenix
notes: Largest hospital in Arizona; affiliated with University of Arizona College of Medicine - Phoenix; part of Banner Health, a 33-hospital nonprofit system
